price: 9. Kemudian aku menyeru mereka secara terbuka dan dengan diam-diam,*(869)
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا
footnotes: *869). Dakwah ini dilakukan setelah dakwah dengan cara diam-diam tidak berhasil.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma innī aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'rāran
